UDP_PLOT_COMMAND:
plot1 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string1 = %f;
name1 = Yaw
linewidth1 = 2
plot2 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string2 = %*f; %f;
name2 = Pitch
linewidth2 = 2
plot3 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string3 = %*f; %*f; %f;
name3 = Roll
linewidth3 = 2
plot4 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string4 = %*f; %*f; %*f; %f;
name4 = Heave
linewidth4 = 2
UDP_MOD_COMMAND:
# udp input

yaw_proportion = 1
pitch_proportion = 0.1
roll_proportion = 0.1
heave_proportion = 1

yaw_recover_enable = 0
yaw_recover_target = 255
yaw_recover_proportion = 0.1


spline_enable = 0

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 1
yaw_c3 = 0

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1
pitch_c3 = 0

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = 1
roll_c3 = 0

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 0
heave_c3 = 0

spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
spline_interpolation_rate = 10
MWAVE_MOD_COMMAND:
# motion wave

yaw_proportion = 1
pitch_proportion = 1
roll_proportion = 1
heave_proportion = 1

spline_enable = 1

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 1
yaw_c3 = 0

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1
pitch_c3 = 0

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = 1
roll_c3 = 0

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 1
heave_c3 = 0

#spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
#spline_interpolation_rate = 10

motionview_spline_sampling_rate = 2
motionview_spline_interpolation_rate = 2
motionview_time_scaling = 1
motionview_start_delay = 20
JOYSTICK_MOD_COMMAND:
# joystick

yaw_proportion = 1
pitch_proportion = 1
roll_proportion = 1
heave_proportion = 1

spline_enable = 1

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 1
yaw_c3 = 0

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1
pitch_c3 = 0

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = 1
roll_c3 = 0

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 1
heave_c3 = 0

spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
spline_interpolation_rate = 10
MIXING_COMMAND:
#input = udp
#input = motionwave
input = joystick+udp+motionwave

mixing_input1_enable = 0
mixing_rate1_all = 0
mixing_rate1_yaw = 0
mixing_rate1_pitch = 0
mixing_rate1_roll = 0
mixing_rate1_heave = 0

mixing_input2_enable = 1
mixing_rate2_all = 1
mixing_rate2_yaw = 0
mixing_rate2_pitch = 0
mixing_rate2_roll = 0
mixing_rate2_heave = 0

mixing_input3_enable = 0
mixing_rate3_all = 0
mixing_rate3_yaw = 0
mixing_rate3_pitch = 0
mixing_rate3_roll = 0
mixing_rate3_heave = 0

mixing_bias_yaw = 0
mixing_bias_pitch = 0
mixing_bias_roll = 0
mixing_bias_heave = 0
